title: The Oracle's Silence
goal: Kaelen and Lyra seek counsel from an ancient oracle, only to find it corrupted or rendered unresponsive by the Shadow Blight.

beats.summary: Acting on Kaelen's ancient memories, they journey to a remote, sacred site, once a renowned oracle of immense power and insight.
They discover the site is desecrated, its ancient stones defiled, and the oracle's chamber filled with an unnatural, stifling silence.
Kaelen senses a powerful, corrupting presence that has not merely silenced the oracle, but twisted its very essence, sealing it off from the world.
A brief, tense skirmish erupts with shadowy, corrupted creatures guarding the desolate site, manifestations of the blight's pervasive reach.
